title: Keyed
alt: I was sure he was just getting revenge, but then he did the same thing to Carrie Underwood. Then he mailed me a scone. I think I'm giving up dating.
transcript:
[Ponytail and Cueball are walking along.]
Ponytail: I broke up with him yesterday.
Cueball: That weird guy with the beret? Did he take it okay?Ponytail: He seemed upset. He went out to my car—
Cueball: Uh oh.
Ponytail: —and spent the whole night painting a really detailed key on the side.
Cueball: ...Wait, what?
[Image of Beret Guy painting a giant key on the side of a car.]Ponytail: Then he woke me up to ask what I thought of it. He looked really proud.
[Beret Guy holding a paintbrush.]Cueball: I ... is he playing revenge mind games?
Ponytail: I genuinely can't tell if he remembers that we broke up.
